sentences.en: an eyewitness account of the suffering of the refugees
sentences.cn: 目击者对难民苦难遭遇的叙述

sentences.en: And you know that eyewitness that's been clogging up the airwaves?
sentences.cn: 你知道那个充斥着电视广播的目击证人?

sentences.en: China Shakes the World is his eyewitness record of that heroic time.
sentences.cn: 《中国震撼世界》就是贝尔登对这个英雄时代的目击报告.

sentences.en: Eyewitness reports construct a detailed description of the man.
sentences.cn: 目击者的报告构成了有关此人相貌的一幅详图.

sentences.en: He was the only eyewitness of the robbery.
sentences.cn: 他是那起抢劫案的唯一目击者.

sentences.en: I have an eyewitness that places you at his apartment two nights ago.
sentences.cn: 我这里有位目击者说看到你前天晚上在他的公寓前.

sentences.en: Just one eyewitness's account has come down to us.
sentences.cn: 只有一位目击者留下的叙述使我们得知当时的情景.

sentences.en: Official notification of an eyewitness quoted as confirming that the above - mentioned witnesses.
sentences.cn: 官方通报中援引了现场目击者的话,证实了上述目击者的说法.

sentences.en: One eyewitness said he saw her talking to a man in a blue car.
sentences.cn: 一名目击者说他看见她在跟一个坐在蓝色汽车里的男子说话。

sentences.en: Reliabitity of eyewitness evidence is never absolute.
sentences.cn: 目击证人的证据并非绝对可靠.

sentences.en: She gave an eyewitness account of the crime.
sentences.cn: 她对亲眼目睹的犯罪事件作了陈述.
目击者否认了先前的证词.

sentences.en: The police questioned several eyewitness to the murder.
sentences.cn: 警察询问了谋杀案的几位目击者.

sentences.en: The prosecutor had an ace in the hole: an eyewitness.
sentences.cn: 检举人有秘密武器(神秘王牌): 目击者.

sentences.en: They have a you - are - there eyewitness impact that press accounts lack.
sentences.cn: 而这一点是纸媒体所缺乏的.

sentences.en: What's the last thing Nancy Cahill said to that eyewitness?
sentences.cn: 楠茜·卡希尔最后和目击者说的是什么?

trans.tran_en: someone who has seen something such as a crime happen, and is able to describe it afterwards
